itemLabel: Prince Philippos of Greece and Denmark

wikipedia_page.main: Prince Philippos of Greece and Denmark (Greek: Φίλιππος; born 26 April 1986) is the youngest child of Constantine II and Anne-Marie of Denmark, who were the last King and Queen of Greece, reigning from 1964 to 1973.

response: *Prince Philippos of Greece and Denmark (born 26 April 1986 in St Mary's Hospital, London). On 12 December 2020 in St. Moritz, he married Nina Flohr in a civil ceremony.
*Prince Philippos of Greece and Denmark (born 1986)  son of King Constantine II of Greece and Anne-Marie of Denmark
